title: Available Studio 1 Bath
posting_body: These apartments feature a living room, dining room, and a kitchen with standard appliances, standard countertops, a dishwasher, and disposal.
There is hardwood flooring in the kitchen, living room, dining room, and bathroom(s) with carpet in the bedroom(s) throughout the home.
The bedroom(s) have a closet and the bathroom(s) include a soaking tub.
Features central A/C, central heat, ceiling fans, nine foot ceilings, and closets for additional storage.
Select units include nest thermostat, quartz style countertops, stainless steel appliances, fireplace, and a private balcony/patio.
Full-sized washer/dryer in select units or washer/dryer connections.

Community amenities include a resort style swimming pool with a sundeck and spa, dog park, pet wash station, fire pit, bbq lounge, sand volleyball court, playground, clubhouse, fitness center, yoga room, gaming room, on-site laundry facility, recycling, pet play area, grills, and courtyard.
Off-street unassigned lot parking included in the rent.
Less than a ten-minute commute to Interstate 35.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
